title: How the James Webb Space Telescope will revolutionize astrophysics
description: NASAs James Webb Space Telescope was successfully launched on December 25th. This is the revolutionary successor to the Hubble Space Telescope. The spacecraft still has a long way to go in space, but if all goes well, the vehicle could transform our view of the Universe.
